thread.title: ESPN starts removing videos from YouTube
thread.title_full: ESPN starts removing videos from YouTube

title: ESPN starts removing videos from YouTube
text:
ESPN starts removing videos from YouTube 
Times Of India Saturday 24th October, 2015 
According to media analysts, ESPN is removing its content from YouTube because the YouTube Red platform creates legal issues for the sports broadcaster because of pre-existing contracts with cable and satellite companies....
